create list of valid fill palettes

helper function used to create a data.frame containing info on valid fill palettes for plot_rast, plot_rast_gg and plot_vect

fillpals()

Value

a data.frame containing info on valid fill palettes that can used in plot_rast, plot_rast_gg and plot_vect

Details

DETAILS

Examples


# Print the list of valid fill palettes used in `plot_rast`, `plot_rast_gg`
# and `plot_vect`
fillpals()
#>        name source category cont_qual maxcolors colorblind
#> 1      BrBG brewer      div      cont        11       TRUE
#> 2      PiYG brewer      div      cont        11       TRUE
#> 3      PRGn brewer      div      cont        11       TRUE
#> 4      PuOr brewer      div      cont        11       TRUE
#> 5      RdBu brewer      div      cont        11       TRUE
#> 6      RdGy brewer      div      cont        11      FALSE
#> 7    RdYlBu brewer      div      cont        11       TRUE
#> 8    RdYlGn brewer      div      cont        11      FALSE
#> 9  Spectral brewer      div      cont        11      FALSE
